commands.name: search-folders

preferences.name: searchPaths
preferences.title: Search Directories
preferences.description: Directories to search for folders, separated by commas (default: home directory)

preferences.name: maxHistoryItems
preferences.title: Max History Items
preferences.description: Maximum number of recent folders to remember

preferences.name: searchDepth
preferences.title: Search Depth
preferences.description: How deep to search in subdirectories

preferences.name: maxResults
preferences.title: Max Search Results
preferences.description: Maximum number of folders to display in search results

preferences.name: debounceDelay
preferences.title: Search Delay
preferences.description: Delay before starting search after typing (milliseconds)

preferences.name: enableFuzzyMatch
preferences.title: Enable Fuzzy Matching

preferences.label: Enable fuzzy matching for more flexible search

preferences.name: prioritizeRecent
preferences.title: Prioritize Recent Folders
preferences.description: Give higher scores to recently used folders in search results
preferences.label: Boost recent folders in search rankings
